task.title: Generate XLIFF Files
task.shortdesc: Steps for generating XLIFF files from a JavaPM project.

step.cmd: In File menu, select Open JavaPM Project.
Locate and open the JavaPM project to be localized.
In Tasks menu, select Generate XLIFF from Project.
In the XLIFF File text box enter the name of the XLIFF file to generate or use the Browse... button to select a location and file name.
Select the desired target language in the Target Language drop-down list.
Click the Accept button to generate the XLIFF file.

taskbody.result: The steps described above explain how to generate an XLIFF file for translating a JavaPM project into a given target language. Repeat the procedure for all languages that you wish to support.
